_about: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 8 years of experience in software development. My journey began in 2008 with game server development, which ignited my passion for technology and problem-solving. Since then, I've evolved into a professional developer specializing in modern web technologies and enterprise solutions.
_aboutme_intro: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 8 years of experience in software development. My journey began in 2008 with game server development, which ignited my passion for technology and problem-solving. Since then, I've evolved into a professional developer specializing in modern web technologies and enterprise solutions.
_aboutme_experience: I have successfully delivered multiple enterprise-level projects including booking platforms, financial services applications, and legal consultation systems. My expertise spans from frontend user experiences to backend architecture and database optimization.
_aboutme_tech: Here are some of the key technologies I work with:
_services_description: I offer comprehensive software development services, from web applications to custom solutions tailored to your business needs.
_web_development_desc: Custom web applications using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and more.
_mobile_development_desc: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android.
_software_maintenance_desc: Ongoing support and maintenance for existing software systems.
_consulting_desc: Expert advice on technology stack selection and software architecture.
